TopicTitle: My first TWO orbital rendevous with stock

Articles.Content:
Well, I magaed to do it finnaly It took me many tries to do it for the first time ever. I had first transfered a kerbal from one space plane to another and ended the flight of one (A few quickloads here and there).. but the problem is there was only one seat (I failed to remember this). So I had to send a rescue craft up.. and amazingly I did this on my first try 8)

Now, orbital rendevous with my halo ring?
I want to see a shot of a rocket flying through it.

I want to see a shot of a rocket flying through it.

^I second this. But some how I feel it needs to be made into a challenge where it\'s on a polar orbit and you fly through it on an equatorial orbit. Just a meet up and fly through somehow seems too easy.

^I second this. But some how I feel it needs to be made into a challenge where it\'s on a polar orbit and you fly through it on an equatorial orbit. Just a meet up and fly through somehow seems too easy.

I\'m definently going to attempt that 8) Maybe, make such perfect orbits, that they always go through eachother each time they pass? Extreme challenge right there.
If you ever get it working 100% every time, make sure you do us a video of it in action 8)

If you ever get it working 100% every time, make sure you do us a video of it in action 8)

I gotta get a better computer first haha, the thing is a beast, it lags my computer so much. and instead of getting that to work... Im already working on getting a ring twice as big out 8) maybe make the smaller go through the bigger? and have them line up too I think this could be the time I use my first ever mod haha, Mec-Jeb would certainly help with this im betting.
